solution_line_template: Multiplying through the parentheses, we get 8X + 15X + {adult_cost_constant_part} = ${total_cost}
Subtracting {adult_cost_constant_part} from both sides, we get {coefficient_of_X}X = {total_cost} - {adult_cost_constant_part} = ${rhs_after_subtraction}
Dividing both sides by {coefficient_of_X}, we get X = ${rhs_after_subtraction} / {coefficient_of_X} = <<{rhs_after_subtraction}/{coefficient_of_X}={num_children}>>{num_children} children.
